description: Marlberry, or Ardisia japonica, is an amazing and unique plant species native to East Asia. Known for its vibrant pink to red berries, these small evergreen shrubs feature excellent drought tolerance, as well as cold and humidity tolerance. As an added bonus, Marlberry is adaptable to a wide range of soils, making it extremely versatile when it comes to landscaping projects. Rather modest in size, Marlberry is easy to maintain and can be trained for use as a low hedge or as a specimen plant, adding vibrant color and lush foliage all year round. With its easy maintenance, Marlberry is a great addition to any garden.
